time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: 化肥、农药、柴油、种子等农资投入由《2011 全国农产品成本收益资料汇编》得到， 并根据 2010 年农资平均市场价格转化为投入的实物量， 农资生产水资源消耗量采用中国生命周期数据库( Chinese LifeCycle Database， CLCD) ， 在 SimaPro 7. 3. 2 中进行运算

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: In this paper, the Yellow River, Huaihe River, Haihe River and Yangtze River Basin, which are the main production areas of wheat, were selected to calculate the water footprints of wheat production in different regions at the farmland scale, and compare the results with those based on the virtual water method.
本文选取小麦主产区黄河、淮河、海河和长江流域为代表， 计算不同区域小麦生产农田尺度的水足迹， 并与基于虚拟水方法计算的结果进行比较

technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set describes the water footprint and carbon emission factors at the farmland scale for wheat production in China's main producing areas: the Yellow River, Huaihe River, Haihe River, and Yangtze River Basins. It is used for understanding regional water resource impacts in wheat farming systems and comparing these impacts using the virtual water method. This data can apply to agricultural policy formation, sustainable farming practices, and environmental impact assessments for wheat production.
该数据集描述了中国小麦主产区黄河、淮河、海河和长江流域农田尺度的小麦生产水足迹和碳排放因素。它用于了解小麦农作系统的区域水资源影响并使用虚拟水方法进行比较。这些数据可以应用于农业政策制定、可持续农业实践和小麦生产的环境影响评估。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Effective rainfall and irrigation water consumption for wheat production in each basin were obtained from the literature; agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, pesticides, diesel fuel, seeds, etc. were obtained from the 2011 National Agricultural Products Cost and Benefit Information Compendium, and converted into inputs according to the average market price of agricultural inputs in 2010, and the consumption of water for agricultural production was calculated in SimaPro 7.3.2 using the Chinese Life Cycle Database (CLCD). Water consumption in agricultural production was calculated using the Chinese Life Cycle Database (CLCD) in SimaPro 7.3.2.
各流域小麦生产消耗的有效降雨和灌溉水消耗量来自文献; 化肥、农药、柴油、种子等农资投入由《2011 全国农产品成本收益资料汇编》得到， 并根据 2010 年农资平均市场价格转化为投入的实物量， 农资生产水资源消耗量采用中国生命周期数据库( Chinese Life Cycle Database， CLCD) ， 在 SimaPro 7. 3. 2 中进行运算。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: 灰水需求量仅计算了将农田淋失的氮稀释到美国环保部门( EPA) 推荐的饮用水可接受浓度 10 mg·L － 1 时所需水量 ， 氮淋失率按我国旱地农田平均氮淋失率 4. 35% 计算。本文利用来自文献的年均降水、有效降雨数据( 1997—2004 年平均) 以及 ArcGIS 10. 0 计算得到的各流域面积， 以草地生态系统作参照将小麦农作系统对蓝水资源的影响进行了量化。黄河、淮河、海河和长江流域的 WSI分别为 0.922、0.524、0.984 和 0. 047

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Xu Changchun, Huang Jing, Ridoutt B G, Liu Jijun, & Chen Fu. LCA-based Product Water Footprinting and a Case Study. Journal of Natural Resources 28, 873–880 (2013).
Xu Changchun, Huang Jing, Ridoutt B G, Liu Jijun, & Chen Fu. LCA-based Product Water Footprinting and a Case Study. Journal of Natural Resources 28, 873–880 (2013).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data, consider the regional variability of water footprints and ensure that comparisons are accurate by taking into account local agricultural practices. Pay attention to the methodological approach used for calculating the water footprint, such as effective rainfall, irrigation water consumption, and dilution water requirements for nitrogen leaching. Adjust impact assessments in line with the technological and operational specifics characteristic to each river basin and the ecological reference used (i.e., grassland ecosystem). Also, ensure that the input data such as fertilizer, pesticides, diesel, and seed quantities are based on up-to-date and locally relevant market prices.
使用此数据时，应考虑水足迹的区域变异性，并确保通过考虑当地农业实践使比较准确。注意用于计算水足迹的方法论方法，例如有效降雨量、灌溉用水消耗量以及稀释氮素淋溜所需的水量。根据每个流域特有的技术和操作细节以及所使用的生态参考（即，草地生态系统）调整影响评估。此外，确保输入数据如化肥、农药、柴油和种子数量是基于最新且与当地相关的市场价格。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
